itemDescription: British-Dutch visual artist, photographer and art critic

wikipedia_page.main: Michael Gibbs (1949-2009) was a British poet and visual artist. He lived and worked in Amsterdam until his death in 2009.

response: * Michael Gibbs (politician) (1870–1943), Newfoundland lawyer and politician
* Michael Gibbs (composer) (born 1937), jazz composer and arranger
* Michael Gibbs (priest) (1900–1962), Dean of Cape Town and Dean of Chester
*Michael Gibbs (poet) (1949–2009), British poet and visual artist
